message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?

Hi Bob, I understand your offer of $70 is a good one, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal too. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $75?
Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go down to $75. How about we meet at $80? That way, we can both get a good deal.
